Author: snefferu
Text: Some of them say “you look well!” (And they really mean it 💛 if you haven’t emotionally recovered this will sting like fuck but I’ve come to realize that it’s a huge compliment and I honestly can’t wait for these comments this time around)  Others... they don’t even notice, (or they give zero fucks 😂 ) especially if you’re young. When I was in my teens and early 20s, a lot of people I knew hadn’t even been aware I’d been sick (even though my LW was quite extreme) much less they noticed that I looked normal 😏 people have their own problems, and young people are so busy with studying, partying, dating, having fun etc that you can get away with gaining 20kg and they won’t bat an eyelid 😉

Author: eardingu
Text: They saw me at my LW and at my HW. They didn't really comment on my weight specifically but they did mention not recognizing me, that I should exercise (I gained a lot of weight)
